topic.title: Is opening port 15441 really optional for creating new sites on ZeroNet?
topic.body: I'm having trouble publish my newly-created site so that others could visit it. When I click sign & publish it says "Your network connection is restricted. Please open 15441 port on your router to make your site accessible for everyone". But in the FAQ https://zeronet.readthedocs.io/en/latest/faq/ it says opening new port is optional. I'm using company network and I don't have access to the router configuration. What should I do now?

topic.title: From the public, for the public
topic.body: The public is vulnerable. The power of people is often mentioned and praised by the media and governments, or a small bunch of people in power. But the public that is made of all ordinary people is quite vulnerable when it comes to protect their values and beliefs. The public is easily manipulated and deceived and exploited by certain individuals who acquired their ability to do so via various ways. How they gain the ability is not important. What they would do with the ability is important. With this ability, they can decide upon what to show to the public and even what's good for the public. As a result, what the public believe is not what they learn through self-reasoning but what those individuals want you to believe. The limitation of geographical and language barriers, the imbalance of development of different regions, and the latency of information transmission further increase the vulnerability of the public.

topic.title: The specialties scheme
topic.body: Modern public education is responsible for creating all kinds of specialists. Priviledged private schools care more about cultivating leaders, or well-rounded people.

1509342996_1CT7RxDQNPEE8X78bDkUPhuaaUUix.body: There's no absolute security, neither there is easy access to your files.

1511777019_17ffrcHNzbFoUe81PyMEagQdv2DGN.body: As my favorite director Akira Kurosawa addressed in his autobiography, human beings are unable to be honest with themselves about themselves. They cannot talk about themselves without embellishing...Egoism is a sin the human being carries with him from birth; it is the most difficult to redeem.

1509649171_1Cy3ntkN2GN9MH6EaW6eHpi4YoRS2.body:
> [gitcenter](#comment_42_1Cy3ntkN2GN9MH6EaW6eHpi4YoRS2nK5Di): Any ideas what features to add to Git Center?
Private repo?

> [gitcenter](#comment_43_1Cy3ntkN2GN9MH6EaW6eHpi4YoRS2nK5Di): You can create a repository (which means create a new zite, in fact) and don't add it to repository index. Then it will be somewhat private.

When I click "sign and publish" it prompts "content publish failed". Is it due to the port 15441 closing? I can't manage to open that port tho.
